itunes:title: Episode 083: St. John Allerdyce (feat. Anthony Oliveira)
title: Episode 083: St. John Allerdyce (feat. Anthony Oliveira)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 83 of CEREBRO, Connor and returning guest Anthony Oliveira (Young Avengers: Paradox Lost) camp it up with St. John Allerdyce, the poetic Pyro! Created by Chris Claremont and John Byrne as an implied gay character, in the 90s Brotherhood of Evil Mutants henchman St. John became the tragic face of the Legacy Virus. Resurrected in the Age of Krakoa, he most recently featured as a regular in Gerry Duggan's run on Marauders.

The CEREBRO character file on Pyro begins at 1:08:20.

(Content Advisory: St. John's story includes terminal illness and attempted suicide. This episode features extensive discussion of the AIDS crisis.)

Thanks to ComiXology for sponsoring the pod! You can sign up for a free trial here.



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
